name: gladys-assistant
description: Gladys is an open-source, privacy-focused home assistant that integrates smart home devices using workflows, scenes, and automations. It supports MQTT, Zigbee, Z-Wave, and cloudless control designed for personal servers.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Manage smart home devices without cloud dependencies or data sharing

features.title: Scenes And Automations
features.description: Create complex workflows and automations triggered by time, sensors, or events

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor and control your home through a customizable web dashboard

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with community-developed integrations and features
